meanings.definition: To write or mark down in a system of notation.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys notating her musical ideas in a notebook.
meanings.sent2: The composer spent hours notating the symphony for the orchestra.
meanings.sent3: Notating her thoughts on paper helped her organize them better.
meanings.sent4: The teacher notated the key points on the whiteboard for the students to remember.
meanings.sent5: He was notating the rhythm of the song with great precision.

meanings.definition: To record or make a note of something.
meanings.sent1: He is notating the important details from the meeting in his planner.
meanings.sent2: The secretary notated the phone call in the logbook.
meanings.sent3: Notating the recipe ingredients was crucial for the cooking competition.
meanings.sent4: She notated the address on a sticky note to remember it later.
meanings.sent5: The scientist was notating the changes in the experiment results meticulously.
